original_text: And command ye them, saying, Take you hence out of the midst of Jordan, out of the place where the priests' feet stood firm, twelve stones, and ye shall carry them over with you, and leave them in the lodging place, where ye shall lodge this night.
korean_text: 그들에게 명령하여 이르기를 요단 가운데 제사장들의 발이 굳게 선 그 곳에서 돌 열둘을 택하여 그것을 가져다가 오늘밤 너희가 유숙할 그 곳에 두게 하라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: Take you hence out of the midst of Jordan
out of the place where the priests' feet stood firm
and ye shall carry them over with you
and leave them in the lodging place
where ye shall lodge this night
